digraph AudiblezOverview{rankdir=LR;node[shape=rectangle, style=filled, color=lightblue];title[label="Audiblez: E-book to Audiobook Converter", shape=ellipse, style=filled, color=lightgrey];kokoro[label="Kokoro v0.19
